programme.title: Tucked
Na zakładkę
Tucked
programme.desc:
Tucked: Directed by Jamie Patterson. With Derren Nesbitt, Jordan Stephens, April Pearson, Steve Oram. TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. As they discover more about each other, they realize how to truly be themselves. It's a 'slice of life' drama about love, loss and friendship; a feel good film with a great charm and sense of humour." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6773126/","name":"Tucked","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2I5MDI0ZTUtZjU3MS00OTJlLTkxMjEtYjM5YzU0NjY1YWM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ5ODczNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. programme.title: Mon frère
Mój koniec. Twój początek
Mein Ende. Dein Anfang.
programme.desc: Mon frère: Directed by Julien Abraham. With MHD, Darren Muselet, Aïssa Maïga, Jalil Lespert. Because he wanted to protect his little brother from a father too violent, Teddy, a young man without history, is accused of the murder of his father and is sent to a closed educational center, waiting for his trial for parricide . He then plunges into a brutal universe of which he does not know the rules." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9095526/","name":"Mon frère","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmViODhhNGYtZTA1OC00ODQ2LTkwZGMtNjE5NDk0NGIxOTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Because he wanted to protect his little brother from a father too violent, Teddy, a young man without history, is accused of the murder of his father and is sent to a closed educational center, waiting for his trial for parricide . H","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9095526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Poignant.","reviewBody":"This film reminds me LES HAUTS MURS, another film made in 2008 and adapted from an Auguste Le Breton's novel. Here we find the same atmosphere, same kind of characters and the relationships that exist between them. A very accurate picture of young delinquents, most of them raised by foster families, who never knew their actual parents, who never grew with love, affection or friendship. But I think it could have been better, more moving. The potential was there but the film makers seemed to hesitate to go further. Acting is over the top, except the scene where the mother meets her boys after several years. She should have been surprised, astonished, but no, she seemed to wait for them after only one week end of separation. I would also have preferred another darker ending.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":976,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-07-31","keywords":"juvenile delinquency,reform school,brother brother relationship,killing one's own father,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-Annonce [VO]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi588561433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwNGQwYjUtODNiNC00ZGY5LWJjODItN2UyM2QxZmFlYjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwNGQwYjUtODNiNC00ZGY5LWJjODItN2UyM2QxZmFlYjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7366968/","name":"MHD"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9288184/","name":"Darren Muselet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0563740/","name":"Aïssa Maïga"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5367831/","name":"Julien Abraham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0757290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0757291/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2425150/","name":"Nicolas Peufaillit"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5595044/","name":"Hélène Tolède-Couronne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5367786/","name":"Jimmy Laporal-Trésor"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Wind in the Willows
O czym szumią wierzby
The Wind in the Willows
programme.desc: The Wind in the Willows: Directed by Terry Jones. With Steve Coogan, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Antony Sher. Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118172/","name":"The Wind in the Willows","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MTg4MzE4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzY3NDUyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118172/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GazHack"},"dateCreated":"1999-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sun drenched, cheery fun.","reviewBody":"A splendid, energetic version of one the classics of children's literature which benefits from a stellar cast of British acting talent. Aside from nearly every Python appearing to good effect, we have a touching performance from Steve Coogan as the downtrodden Mole, Anthony Sher as a hissable Chief Weasel and... well to many famous faces to mention.\n\nWhat makes this version stand out is the stunning costume and production design by James Acherson. This is a caricartured version of olde England, with the animals played by cartoonish humans rather than anthromorphosised animals. The sun always shines, everything is polished and colourful. There's some subtle satire about the class system going on in the background but director Jones doesn't let that get in the way. Only the factory subplot strikes a wrong note, tending to clutter up the last half of the film but not seriously. Genuinely for children of all ages.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3183,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2000-06-21","keywords":"weasel,mole,toad,rat,mating","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Wind in the Willows","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi418560793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMxMmZmZGEtNjZkMC00NjdiLWIyMWYtNzY5NWQ3NWQyMGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMxMmZmZGEtNjZkMC00NjdiLWIyMWYtNzY5NWQ3NWQyMGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001385/","name":"Eric Idle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001402/","name":"Terry Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001402/","name":"Terry Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052092/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001402/","name":"Terry Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334370/","name":"Kenneth Grahame"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Voir le jour
Na świat
Voir le jour
programme.desc: Voir le jour: Directed by Marion Laine. With Sandrine Bonnaire, Brigitte Roüan, Aure Atika, Sarah Stern. Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11154574/","name":"Voir le jour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjBkMDgzNWUtZmFjMy00MTY2LTljMGEtNjkyMzc3ZjAxMjhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11154574/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nurse's work is never done.","reviewBody":"It could not have come at a better time,this tribute to the staff of a maternity hospital:midwives, nurses, nurses' aides .I could do without Bonnaire's rock singer past and her daughter's clichéed frames of mind ;the gist of the movie , which takes place in the maternity is close to documentary ,and Sandrine Bonnaire is not really the star , all the actresses are admirable: the midwife (Brigitte Rouan ) did not choose this job -she wanted to become a doctor- but her work has become her raison d'être ,in spite of moments of despondency .These underpaid women 's commitment to their work is extraordinary: from the nurses' aide who rocks a crying baby to sleep to Bonnaire who literally saves a baby -and there's won't be any vainglory or legion d'honneur -;one feels the compassion ,the camaraderie ,the solidarity when one of them is held responsible for the death of a baby ,the joie de vivre when ,during a rebellion against the inhuman working conditions (a meager bonus of 20 euros for night work ) , they break into a song "mamy blue" which cheers them up. Even though sometimes they quarrel or meet people at the door shouting against the termination of pregnancy.\n\nThe first sequence sums it up in an admirably succint style: too many patients , shortstaffed nurses and others...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-08-12","keywords":"mother,midwife,maternity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi845725209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094789/","name":"Sandrine Bonnaire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747690/","name":"Brigitte Roüan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004133/","name":"Aure Atika"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0486596/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0624903/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1125358/","name":"Julie Bonnie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8279997/","name":"Laura Piani"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Na zakładkę
Tucked
programme.desc:
Tucked: Directed by Jamie Patterson. With Derren Nesbitt, Jordan Stephens, April Pearson, Steve Oram. TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. As they discover more about each other, they realize how to truly be themselves. It's a 'slice of life' drama about love, loss and friendship; a feel good film with a great charm and sense of humour." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6773126/","name":"Tucked","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2I5MDI0ZTUtZjU3MS00OTJlLTkxMjEtYjM5YzU0NjY1YWM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ5ODczNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. programme.title: Śmierć psa
La Muerte de Un Perro
programme.desc: Mario (Guillermo Arengo) prowadzi spokojne, niczym niezakłócone życie. Pracuje jako weterynarz. W jesieni życia towarzyszy mu żona Sylvia (Pelusa Vidal). Pewnego dnia w klinice weterynaryjnej dochodzi do śmierci psa, a następująca po tym paranoja żony Maria wprowadza zamęt w jego uporządkowany świat. Jedna z teorii spiskowych Sylvii doprowadza do konfliktu między córką pary i jej mężem, których zaprosili do swojego domu. Nominacja do Głównej Nagrody Jury na festiwalu Slamdance.

programme.title: Voir le jour
Na świat
Voir le jour
programme.desc: Voir le jour: Directed by Marion Laine. With Sandrine Bonnaire, Brigitte Roüan, Aure Atika, Sarah Stern. Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11154574/","name":"Voir le jour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjBkMDgzNWUtZmFjMy00MTY2LTljMGEtNjkyMzc3ZjAxMjhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11154574/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nurse's work is never done.","reviewBody":"It could not have come at a better time,this tribute to the staff of a maternity hospital:midwives, nurses, nurses' aides .I could do without Bonnaire's rock singer past and her daughter's clichéed frames of mind ;the gist of the movie , which takes place in the maternity is close to documentary ,and Sandrine Bonnaire is not really the star , all the actresses are admirable: the midwife (Brigitte Rouan ) did not choose this job -she wanted to become a doctor- but her work has become her raison d'être ,in spite of moments of despondency .These underpaid women 's commitment to their work is extraordinary: from the nurses' aide who rocks a crying baby to sleep to Bonnaire who literally saves a baby -and there's won't be any vainglory or legion d'honneur -;one feels the compassion ,the camaraderie ,the solidarity when one of them is held responsible for the death of a baby ,the joie de vivre when ,during a rebellion against the inhuman working conditions (a meager bonus of 20 euros for night work ) , they break into a song "mamy blue" which cheers them up. Even though sometimes they quarrel or meet people at the door shouting against the termination of pregnancy.\n\nThe first sequence sums it up in an admirably succint style: too many patients , shortstaffed nurses and others...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-08-12","keywords":"mother,midwife,maternity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi845725209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094789/","name":"Sandrine Bonnaire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747690/","name":"Brigitte Roüan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004133/","name":"Aure Atika"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0486596/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0624903/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1125358/","name":"Julie Bonnie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8279997/","name":"Laura Piani"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lorelei
Lorelei
programme.desc:
Lorelei: Directed by Sabrina Doyle. With Jena Malone, Pablo Schreiber, Ryan Findley, Cory Ellis. A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6461318/","name":"Lorelei","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY4ZGM4MWEtOTYxMC00OWE4LTllNWMtYzNjNWIxMTFlYjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg4MDY0MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6461318/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marcnieden"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"As realistic as it gets","reviewBody":"This is not some sort of action-genre nor is it an edge-of-seat thriller. However, this movie gives a brutal insight into some meaningless and worthless lives, of which plenty exists in our world. It is wonderfully played and directed, while the storyline sticks to the real stigma of low-life, survival, and struggle.

Why am I writing this? I was only 17-years old when I was desperate to escape a wretched child and youthhood. Back then, I met a woman who made me feel comfortable, loved an understood; never mind she was 6 years my senior and was mother to three children from her first marriage. I fell for her - and failed but struggled on for an unbelievable 45 years.

If some state here that this movie is nothing more than a 'wandering tale', than I dare to argue that that is what life is. Life is not fixed, nor does it proceed steadily. There are always difficulties, arguments, disagreements, and struggles. Even more so when people hit the lows and must live with little or no prospects. However, life can get compelling and testing when relationships evolve that have not much hope from the outset.

This movie leads the viewer in a very realistic surround of financial and relational struggles. To intensify the story, Weyland (Pablo) plays a character who was just released from prison after 15 years, meaning he would have had no real prospects of getting a fair chance or a decent job. Indeed, that gives the story another edge while leading the viewer in a world, 'normal' people cannot relate to.

Overall, it is a movie worth watching. It may seem boring for some, but others may find some resemblances to their own lives, past or present. The actors played their roles well and realistic, while I give credit to the director for packing so much real-life' into a small movie.

What follows is a lyrical take on love, regret and second chances."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0540441/","name":"Jena Malone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1032567/","name":"Pablo Schreiber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277547/","name":"Ryan Findley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1397734/","name":"Sabrina Doyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362036/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1397734/","name":"Sabrina Doyle"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6461318, Title: Lorelei, --- Description: Lorelei: Directed by Sabrina Doyle. With Jena Malone, Pablo Schreiber, Ryan Findley, Cory Ellis. A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6461318/","name":"Lorelei","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY4ZGM4MWEtOTYxMC00OWE4LTllNWMtYzNjNWIxMTFlYjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg4MDY0MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A working-class fable about a biker, a mermaid and three shades of blue.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6461318/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"marcnieden","dateCreated":"2021-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"As realistic as it gets","reviewBody":"This is not some sort of action-genre nor is it an edge-of-seat thriller. However, this movie gives a brutal insight into some meaningless and worthless lives, of which plenty exists in our world. It is wonderfully played and directed, while the storyline sticks to the real stigma of low-life, survival, and struggle.

Why am I writing this? I was only 17-years old when I was desperate to escape a wretched child and youthhood. Back then, I met a woman who made me feel comfortable, loved an understood; never mind she was 6 years my senior and was mother to three children from her first marriage. I fell for her - and failed but struggled on for an unbelievable 45 years.

If some state here that this movie is nothing more than a 'wandering tale', than I dare to argue that that is what life is. Life is not fixed, nor does it proceed steadily. There are always difficulties, arguments, disagreements, and struggles. Even more so when people hit the lows and must live with little or no prospects. However, life can get compelling and testing when relationships evolve that have not much hope from the outset.

This movie leads the viewer in a very realistic surround of financial and relational struggles. To intensify the story, Weyland (Pablo) plays a character who was just released from prison after 15 years, meaning he would have had no real prospects of getting a fair chance or a decent job. Indeed, that gives the story another edge while leading the viewer in a world, 'normal' people cannot relate to.

Overall, it is a movie worth watching. It may seem boring for some, but others may find some resemblances to their own lives, past or present. The actors played their roles well and realistic, while I give credit to the director for packing so much real-life' into a small movie.

I really did enjoy and digest this great story.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":997,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-30","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1980416025","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwNDEyMGItNGRjZi00OTQwLTk1NTEtMDViMWFhNzI0M2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After 15 years in prison, Wayland (Pablo Schreiber) reunites with his high school girlfriend, Dolores (Jena Malone), who is now a single mother of three. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Equalizer
The Equalizer
Agentka McCall
The Equalizer
programme.desc:
The Equalizer: Created by Andrew W. Marlowe, Terri Edda Miller. With Queen Latifah, Tory Kittles, Adam Goldberg, Lorraine Toussaint. An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt11242246/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MTgwYWUtMTc2NC00ZDdmLWIyNDAtOGJkNTQyZjM0NDA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11242246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fredwmeyer2"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This series is all "Tell, Don't Show"... and that's the problem.","reviewBody":"The concept of "show, don't tell" was completely lost on the writers room. Every character had to describe every other character as "the best of the best", "the best the agency ever had", "the best I've ever seen".

If you have to tell your audience someone is the best, then they are probably not. The writers are just getting in their own way with excessive dialogue when some simple staging would allow viewers to come to their own conclusions., Instead, we're being TOLD everything.

Also, Queen Latifah is a good actress. She is, however, remarkably miscast in this series. The writers aren't writing to her strengths-- rock solid persona and strong delivery. Instead, they're trying to portray her as a seasoned fighter and are putting her in scenes where she's shown being physically violent. Those scenes fall flat due to the excessive jump cuts needed to compensate for the actress' lack of natural physicality. The classic 80's series did this well-- writing for McCall as a seasoned veteran in his late 50's vs. a modern spec ops warrior. As such, the original McCall used intimidation more than direct physical violence as his key weapon.

This series could be saved but it needs some heavy reworking. Right now it feels like "Equalizer in Name Only". Branding this as a remake of the original series is a disservice to all involved. Instead, create a brand new character for your very talented lead and stop trying to retread the past.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8316,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-02-07","keywords":"justice,fighter,woman warrior,action heroine,one woman army","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457796/","name":"Tory Kittles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004965/","name":"Adam Goldberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110950/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0549256/","name":"Andrew W. Marlowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0589410/","name":"Terri Edda Miller"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Superbowl 2021 Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1113178393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU1MTlhY2ItNWVjZC00MzI2LWIzYWEtNDYxYjkyY2Y0ZTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDU1MTlhY2ItNWVjZC00MzI2LWIzYWEtNDYxYjkyY2Y0ZTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the series premiere of The Equalizer airing after Super Bowl LV on CBS, Academy Award nominee and multi-hyphenate Queen Latifah stars as Robyn McCall, an enigmatic former CIA operative who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn.

Watch all-new episodes of The Equalizer on Sundays at 8/7c on CBS and CBS All Access."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0455944, Title: The Equalizer, --- Description: The Equalizer: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, Chloë Grace Moretz, David Harbour. A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455944/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MzE2NTk0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM3NTk1MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455944/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjacksongta","dateCreated":"2015-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Home Depot EQUALS a bad place to be while on Robert McCall's bad side","reviewBody":"In terms of an action movie I gave the equalizer a 7 but soon after felt the need to watch it again and then upped it to an 8. Why? We'll it's an action movie but yet there's no crazy car chases, there's no bombs or heavy big explosions every where. Really the only action scenes are the fight scenes and even they don't come that often. But when they do come they deliver. Denzel is as awesome as ever in these scenes and the creativity in these scenes are what sets it apart from every other action movie. The main character Robert McCall in an ex specialist of some sort, you don't know what at first but know that he's highly trained in something and is now working as an ordinary man working at Home Depot or home Mart as it is in the movie. He looks like just your every day man but can kill you with just about any everyday weapon. And he does this so calmly that big crazy car scenes and explosions would rake away from his character. A man that takes the bus to come kill a whole gang is pretty bad ass by any standard. \n\nAs always I don't want to give spoilers but I do recommend this as a good wholesome action movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":350274,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-26","keywords":"vigilante,prostitute,mysterious past,gangster,ex soldier","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1649060889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former black ops commando who faked his death for a quiet life in Boston comes out of his retirement to rescue a young girl and finds himself face to face with Russian gangsters.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631269/","name":"Chloë Grace Moretz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921013/","name":"Richard Wenk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0805994/","name":"Michael Sloan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2030456/","name":"Richard Lindheim"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

The Resident
programme.desc:
The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fatelovesthefearless"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for yourself! It's not bad!","reviewBody":"It's not the greatest medical drama and does not compare to ER as far as realism goes but as a nurse most of the medical stuff is correct and every show gets stuff wrong so don't not like a medical show because it's not 100% accurate. 

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. Charming, arrogant and only a third-year resident, Conrad does everything in the most unconventional way possible."}}</script><metacontent="

I like that they have taken this show on from a different angle - money and corruption! I don't live in the USA but I imagine this is actually quite accurate in the way hospitals are run and that it is all about money and not necessarily doing what's best for the patient. 

The characters so far are interesting - I'm 7 episodes in and I like that some patients are in it for longer than an episode. There are characters you want to root for the do gooders and there are characters you love to hate who are selfish, rich and really in the wrong business. Oh and there's a main character that's a nurse which is always a plus since we basically make the hospitals run! 

So if you like medical dramas give it a go! I've seen them all - ER is the best, I've got a soft spot for Greys Anatomy even though sometimes it's ridiculous m, Code Black is great, Chicago Med is alright, The night shift was good. They are all entertaining so in my mind they do what they are suppose to!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21065,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: Furious 6
Szybcy i wściekli 6
Furious 6
programme.desc:
Furious 6: Directed by Justin Lin. With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster. Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1905041/","name":"Furious 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTg2NDQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc2NzQzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaClown"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Builds Upon The Winning Blockbuster Formula Of Fast Five.","reviewBody":"The sixth instalment in The Fast and the Furious franchise, Fast & Furious 6 follows into the footsteps of its predecessor and continues the series' new-found mantra of departing from its original street racing theme to move further into the heist thriller sub-genre. And even if it's not as refreshing & impressive as Fast Five, it nonetheless succeeds as another thrilling, ridiculously entertaining & undeniably fun extravaganza.

The story of Fast & Furious 6 concerns Dominic Toretto & his crew, all of whom have retired to a comfortable life following the heist they pulled off in the previous chapter yet they still remain wanted fugitives in their homeland. But when Hobbs asks for their services to take down a skilled mercenary organisation in exchange for clearing their criminal records, Dom accepts the deal and reassembles his team to finish one last job.

Directed by Justin Lin, Fast & Furious 6 is his final stint with this franchise and he decides to go out on a high note by delivering a picture that's far too enjoyable to worry about the laws of physics being bent here on few occasions. The screenplay packs in an interesting plot filled with excellent use of humour but it isn't as tightly gripped as the last instalment and is a slight step down in comparison. But a few elements do get an upgrade.

The technical aspects follow the same formula that was applied in Fast Five and there isn't much to complain here for the set pieces look spectacularly detailed, the action sequences benefit a lot from its energetic camera-work, brilliant editing & more use of practical effects just like the last chapter although at times the action goes way too over-the-top yet not so exaggerated for most viewers to suspend disbelief. And the background score is fitting for the most part.

Coming to the performances, the entire main cast that was present in the last one reprises its role, Michelle Rodrigues also returns to join the gang and Luke Evans is the new addition who plays this chapter's antagonist. Vin Diesel & Paul Walker do their usual best as Toretto & O'Conner, Dwayne Johnson continues to impress as Hobbs, However, Evans doesn't get enough screen time to show his mettle and his characters turns out to be a generic villain. The rest of the cast chips in with fine contributions.

On an overall scale, Fast & Furious 6 builds upon the very ingredients that worked in favour of Fast Five and, barring a couple of issues, manages to stay on the track for the most part. Although not as amazing as the previous entry, this is nevertheless an immensely enjoyable blockbuster material that promises a lot of fun & thrills, and effectively delivers it. Definitely more style than substance although the margin isn't as vast as it had been in the first four chapters of this franchise, Fast & Furious 6 comes delightfully recommended."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":381081,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-05-22","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3225003545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":" Agent Hobbs enlists the aid of Dom and team to help bring a rival gang, led by Owen Shaw, to justice. In exchange for clear records, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: About Time
Czas na miłość
About Time
programme.desc: About Time: Directed by Richard Curtis. With Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams, Bill Nighy, Lydia Wilson. At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2194499/","name":"About Time","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1ODUzMDA3NzFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDgxMTYxNTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2194499/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"steve-atkinson-814-726592"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The reason you go to the movies","reviewBody":"Why do you go to the cinema? For me, it is to be moved. To laugh, to cry, to be frightened, to be in awe, to be amused in a gentle way. This movie did this to me in all 5 ways. I am Mr. Ordinary - I have been lucky enough to be born into a loving family, I have wooed a certain number of women, I have married and enjoyed the highs and lows of having my own family, I have lost my parents. I try in my own way to appreciate others and acknowledge that they are trying to make their way in life. This movie defines me. If you miss it this time, don't worry. You'll catch it later. Most people interested in cinema will see it at some stage. My advice is to go and see it now. It's not perfect - it's a bit English, a bit middle class, the story is preposterous. But the sentiment, the message hits the spot. Take one of your significant others. Take a first date. Take a box of tissues. It's the reason you go to the cinema.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":321812,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2013-09-04","keywords":"time travel,father son relationship,family relationships,wedding,marriage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi802400281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5MTAyNzgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ4ODI1MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5MTAyNzgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ4ODI1MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727304/","name":"Domhnall Gleeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1046097/","name":"Rachel McAdams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0631490/","name":"Bill Nighy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003062/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bringing Down the House
Wszystko się wali
Bringing Down the House
programme.desc: Bringing Down the House: Directed by Adam Shankman. With Steve Martin, Queen Latifah, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright. When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0305669/","name":"Bringing Down the House","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTUyMTM2MjMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwOTA0Mzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0305669/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"faul8769"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a hoot! Steve Martin at his wild and crazy best!","reviewBody":"I loved it. Hit my funny bone in a BIG way. The scene on the couch was Steve Martin as I remember him at his wild and crazy (SNL) best! There are sooooo many good lines! How could you have found a better, laughable, racist than Betty White? And Eugene Levy attracted to the "dark side"...... I laugh until I hurt every time I watch it. Remember, the humor is so tongue in cheek, you can't take it seriously. Jean Smart has always been one of my favorites, but lacks a little pizzaz in this one--she's the only one I was disappointed in. Hello, you coco goddess! I especially like the banter between Charlene and the ex-sister-in-law. Ex-sister-in-law reminds me of a WKRP Jennifer, gone bad! Mark it down as one of my favorites!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35790,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-06-04","keywords":"william shakespeare character,lawyer,divorce,villain arrested,spanking","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bringing Down the House","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi985399577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmM3NGZjNzMtYWMzNS00MTkwLWJiMjEtMjhhNGEzODhjOTU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmM3NGZjNzMtYWMzNS00MTkwLWJiMjEtMjhhNGEzODhjOTU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Touchstone Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000188/","name":"Steve Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506405/","name":"Eugene Levy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788202/","name":"Adam Shankman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0278170/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064942/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276821/","name":"Jason Filardi"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Frankie Go Boom
3, 2, 1... Frankie w sieci
Frankie Go Boom
programme.desc:
Frankie Go Boom: Directed by Jordan Roberts. With Charlie Hunnam, Nora Dunn, Sam Anderson, Chris O'Dowd. Frank Bartlett has been tortured, embarrassed, and humiliated by his brother Bruce -- usually on film -- his entire life. programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc:
What Happens in Vegas: Directed by Tom Vaughan. With Cameron Diaz, Ashton Kutcher, Rob Corddry, Lake Bell. A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1033643/","name":"What Happens in Vegas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQyYjE3YjYtNjJkNi00MWY0LWJhNDctZDRmOTY5ZGJiNDI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1033643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DICK STEEL"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Nutshell Review: What Happens In Vegas","reviewBody":"My only trip to the US (not counting the toddler days) where I can remember what the heck I was doing, was back in December 2005 (gee, time flies!) where I spent a total of 7 full days trawling the streets as well as the casinos up and down the Strip and its outskirts, and seriously, it's never as sexy as that portrayed in the movies (or that television series), though you'd truly never really run out of things to do, despite everything being overly expensive at tourist prices. I think I still possess a mental map of everything on the Strip!

And of course, Vegas is famous amongst other things besides the Elvis impersonators, live entertainment etc, is the ability to conduct quicky marriages, which is what Ashton Kutcher's Jack Fuller and Cameron Diaz's Joy McNally get themselves into during a night of drunken stupor and cheap dares, two lonely souls who journey to Sin City as an escapism from their failed lives, where you can enjoy all the pleasures the city have to offer, before the drudge comes kicking in when you receive that credit card bill.

So begins the story when the duo find themselves in a situation to annul their marriage given a night of impulse that they cannot remember, but cannot do so when McNally's quarter was inserted into a jackpot machine by Fuller, and that brought them a cool 3 million dollars jackpot. Which they can't agree how to split the money, and a quirky judge sentenced them to 6 months "hard marriage" to work through their marital vows, before their frozen cash can be touched. As what the trailer had already explicitly spelt out, it's War of the Roses in Mr and Mrs Smith styled couch-therapy sessions by Queen Latifah, with comedy ranging from the slapstick, to the plain juvenile toilet tricks.

Attempts to elevate the movie and give the characters more depth, come in the form of Jack Fuller learning to believe in himself and to shed his playboy, non-committal ways, and with Joy McNally having to learn to let her hair down, lighten up, and basically doing something she loves rather than to continue doing things that she dislikes, in true "live your dream" fashion. And throw in a quirky boss and ideal parents into the mix, you'd have a whole host of supporting cast to boost variety in this rather predictable tale, where you can see the outcome shining brightly like a star in a moonless night.

I thought Ashton Kutcher and Cameron Diaz could be playing themselves, i.e. one's dating an older woman, the other other no qualms in dating younger men. Well, at least their characters had never felt the need to reveal their ages, but you can tell Diaz is a spring chicken no longer since her big screen debut in The Mask. Typical of all her roles, Diaz again plays a ditzy blonde with quirky skill sets, and I thought somebody should really consider giving her a role in an action movie, since she has on display, really menacing looking biceps, and a scene where she got to show off her combo moves of a right hook and reverse roundhouse kick.

Kutcher on the other hand is, well, Kutcher from Punk'd, with nothing really new offered in his role of the smooth talking slacker with brooding good looks. Instead, the one who stole the show was sidekick Rob Corddry as Hater, Fuller's best friend and lawyer. He would already be familiar to some as the crazy Homeland Security agent in Harold and Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay, and I'd stick my neck out to say this is one guy to watch over the next few comedic movies, as he totally let it rip in this movie with his crazy antics.

At best, What Happens in Vegas is ideal for those itching for yet another formulaic romantic- comedy from the factories of Hollywood, or for those who missed out on the hot tickets for Speed Racer. Stay behind after the end credits roll for a final coda. There are 2 at the beginning of the end credits, but hold out right until the end before you decide to make for the exit.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":168924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-05-07","keywords":"jackpot,wedding,drunkenness,hit in the crotch,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Happens in Vegas ... Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2092040473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NzI0MzIwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk0NDc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NzI0MzIwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk0NDc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first trailer for What Happens in Vegas ... "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1117791/","name":"Rob Corddry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891114/","name":"Tom Vaughan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1401416/","name":"Dana Fox"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Serbuan maut 2: Berandal
The Raid 2: Infiltracja
Serbuan maut 2: Berandal
programme.desc: Serbuan maut 2: Berandal: Directed by Gareth Evans. With Iko Uwais, Arifin Putra, Tio Pakusadewo, Oka Antara. Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2265171/","name":"Serbuan maut 2: Berandal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5MTE2NjA4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTUyMjczMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2265171/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adrenilinmatt"},"dateCreated":"2014-04-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"king of action movies","reviewBody":"When I first saw the raid, (redemption) I was blown away. exhilarating action, leaving me breathless at times. I've since watched it multiple times with other friends. And each time, left feeling the same. Now, with such high regard for the first one, naturally I went into this movie, with extremely high expectations. I was NOT disappointed. Not even remotely. It was twice as breathtaking, twice as exhilarating, and endlessly more brutal. A stunning movie. Evans, is unbelievable. His eye for what people want in an action movie is impeccable.The car chase scene (my favorite scene) was one of the best I've seen in recent history. Which is made more impressive by the fact the it was gareths first attempt at directing such a scene. I can't recommend this movie enough. Believe the hype. Absolute 10/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":118432,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-04-11","keywords":"violence,prison,jakarta indonesia,kitchen fight,corrupt police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi530950937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyMDk5Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyMDk5Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Immediately following the events of the original, Officer Rama is pressured to join an anti-corruption task force to guarantee protection for his wife and child. His mission is to get close to a new mob boss, Bangun, by befriending his incarcerated son, Uco. Rama must hunt for information linking Bangun with corruption in the Jakarta Police Department while pursuing a dangerous and personal vendetta that threatens to consume him and bring his mission -- and the organized crime syndicate -- down around him.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3299397/","name":"Iko Uwais"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3345670/","name":"Yayan Ruhian"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3022653/","name":"Arifin Putra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2153088/","name":"Gareth Evans"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014453/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261531/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2153088/","name":"Gareth Evans"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Then the movie comes out and it has got nothing to do with the ending? Don't get me wrong. Resident Evil The Final Chapter was excellent for me. They set us up for one hell of a fight with some characters included then the story following does not have those characters or the story line? programme.title: Na planie
programme.desc: Ciekawostki i wywiady, które nie mogą umknąć fanom kina. Widzowie przekonają się, jak powstawały największe światowe produkcje; zobaczą, co robili aktorzy, gdy wyłączały się kamery i jak wizja reżyserów zmieniała się w czasie pracy nad obrazem.

programme.title: Gravity
Grawitacja
Gravity
programme.desc: Gravity: Directed by Alfonso Cuarón. With Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris, Orto Ignatiussen. Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1454468/","name":"Gravity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE5MzYwMzYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk4MTk0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1454468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stars in Space","reviewBody":"Visually stunning. A real first in the technical department and presumably that was the extent of its intent. None of the great themes of Kubrick's 1968 masterpiece "2001: A Space Odyssey", are present here. This is a superlative, 90 odd minutes of remarkable beauty but the 90 odd minutes become really long because, just like the heroine we have so little to cling on to, story wise. It seems petty to criticize a film of this kind for whatever it doesn't accomplish because what it means to accomplish, it does in spectacular fashion. I just felt that I was served a glorious appetizer without a main course. Two huge stars in space Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Why? If the idea was to dazzled us with something we had never seen before, great unknown actors would have added an extra something. Kubrick used Keir Dullea in "2001: A Space Odyssey", yes, Keir Dullea, or as Noel Coward put it, Keir Dullea, gone tomorrow. We know that if Sandra Bullock was in charge she, one way or another, will land safely. She's terrific, don't get me wrong, but I wasn't as worried about her as I should have been. The last problem was the score. Why? A standard horror/action flick musical score with cheap shots here and there. I think the purity of the work needed to be extended on every department. Now, putting all that aside, director Alfonso Cuaron must be applauded and I strongly recommend you to run and see it in the biggest screen you can find and in 3D.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":790644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-10-09","keywords":"space station,female protagonist,sole survivor,self sacrifice,long take","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Main Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2340006169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NDY0MjM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0NzIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.\r\n\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0164586/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190859/","name":"Alfonso Cuarón"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190861/","name":"Jonás Cuarón"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc:
Ocean's Eleven: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With George Clooney, Cecelia Ann Birt, Paul L. Nolan, Carol Florence. Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0240772/","name":"Ocean's Eleven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzVmYzVkMmUtOGRhMi00MTNmLThlMmUtZTljYjlkMjNkMjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0240772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart Crime Thriller","reviewBody":"A remake of a rat pack film, this was a brave venture to take on, and thank you Steven Soderbergh for this valiant effort. 

Retaining a good cast, Soderbergh has modified this movie to fit with the times, and he has helped create a very slick and stylish thriller.

Danny Ocean, wants to pull off the crime of the century, by ripping off three Casino's at the same time, while at the same time settling a score or two with the casino's owner. With the help of ten others, he might just do it. Or is he not quite as smart as he appears to be.

8/10
